thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Arthur Gerona
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Arthur Gerona

author: Arthur Gerona
title: Arthur Gerona
text:
Firstly, the site is very informative. It contains clear, concise and complete information for everyone interested in solar energy. I especially liked Finn's videos!
Secondly, two of the three solar PV system suppliers got in touch within 48 hours. Both even came over to inspect my property and were more than happy to answer my 1,001 questions.
